spec.name: 39d3cd78
spec.label: How satisfied are you with our product or service?
Please describe your experience or share any feedback in your own words.

parts.text:
Analyze the following customer feedback: {{27.answers.`52244881`}}

Your task is to extract the following two pieces of information:

Sentiment: Categorize the feedback as 'Positive', 'Neutral', 'Negative', 'Satisfied', or 'Unsatisfied'.

Summary: Provide a concise, one-sentence summary of the main point of the feedback.

IMPORTANT: You must respond ONLY with a raw JSON object. Do not include any conversational text, backticks, or 'json' formatting blocks. Use this exact structure: { "sentiment": "your_sentiment_here", "summary": "your_summary_here" }".

spec.help: You can use public or signed URLs as input by using the URLs.
